Walid Mattar ( born June 7, 1980) is a Tunisian film director
He grew up in Tunis and moved to France at the age of 23
He was interested in cinema from a young age, he joined the Faculty of Amateur Cinematographers of Tunisia when he was only thirteen years old
He made several short films before directing his first film in 2017, called Vent du Nord (North Wind)
